block.p: American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Announced the resignation of Dan Evans, assistant general manager.
National Football League NFL--Fined Carolina Panthers DE Sean Gilbert $5,000 for violating the league's dress code policy during a game on Oct. 22.
American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Announced the resignation of Dan Evans, assistant general manager.
National Football League NFL--Fined Carolina Panthers DE Sean Gilbert $5,000 for violating the league's dress code policy during a game on Oct. 22.

American Hockey League CINCINNATI MIGHTY DUCKS--Announced G Aren Miller has been reassigned to the team from Toledo of the ECHL. HARTFORD WOLF PACK--Announced G Johan Holmqvist and G J.F. Labbe have been recalled by the New York Rangers. LOWELL LOCK MONSTERS--Announced G Marcel Cousineau has been recalled by the Los Angeles Kings. Acquired G Steve Passmore on loan from Los Angeles. PHILADELPHIA PHANTOMS--Reassigned G Maxime Ouellet to Rouyn-Noranda of the QMJHL. PORTLAND PIRATES--Acquired RW Glen Metropolit on loan from the Washington Capitals. QUEBEC CITADELLES--Acquired RW Enrico Ciccone on loan from the Montreal Canadiens.
BAYLOR--Signed Dave Bliss, men's basketball coach, to a contract extension. OREGON STATE--Announced junior basketball F Philip Ricci will be redshirted this year.
